title: Which is the best song band in India? - Quora

response.answer_text: Music bands are something not many people in India have any knowledge about or care about. But then, in this journey of search for good music, I have come across some of the best bands which I will like to name- My fav has to be Agnee. It has some of the most beautiful songs I have ever come across in my 22 years of life. Mohan Kanan has one of the most unique and lovable voice and I love him like crazy. Aahatein is my all time favourite companion.Next up is Swastik the band. Not many know about it but go and search YouTube and listen to their numbers like Kuch bhi and Nadiya ke paar. Soulful is the word for them.Bombay Vikings. Needs no introduction. Their lead, Neeraj Shreedhar is still very much around.Sanam. The band of the famous Sanam Puri. Songs like Behka and Tumse were a must for me some years back.Silk Route. It takes something to churn out melodies the way Mohit Chauhan does. He is simply the best. And it all started with Silk Route in 1995.Deepak Rathore Project - Their lead, Deepak Rathore has sung some amazing solos and Shimla tha Ghar is as close to me as it can be.The Local Train - Who doesn't love The Local Train? I was introduced very late to these gem of a band and consider myself lucky to have known them. There are innumerable tracks that I love and you must listen to their album Aalas ke Ped and Choo Lo is the song that made them famous. Most of their tracks are pretty much very listenable.This is all I could find. Special Mention- Aryans. They were very popular years back and have some good songs. Revisiting this answer. Have edited some material and added in. Thank you. AJ! !!! !

Thanks for asking this question.There are lot of extremely talented bands in India by favourite bands are. 1.Parikrama- Delhi based rock and roll band.They are also called “pink Floyd” of India.  Am I Dreaming (LIVE @ MTV) - Parikrama 2.Pentagram-one of the main band who took indie rock scene in Indian to the main stream.Pentagram is a four-piece Indian rock/electronica band started in 1994 in Mumbai, India. Regarded as one of the pioneers of original Indian independent music.  3.Indian ocean-veteran indian band best known for their album Black Friday.This is band who inspired generation of indie rock scene.  4.Underground Authority- is an alternative rock / rap rock band. Formed in early 2010, in Kolkata, their music is flavoured by a blend of protest poetry, reggae, alternate, rap rock and hard rock. The band is noted for their socio-political messages / anti captalism agenda in their song lyrics.  5.Raghu Dixit and Project-The Raghu Dixit Project is a contemporary Indian folk band based in Bangalore, India.Their music is very soulful and the vocalist of this band is very unique.  6.Indus Creed-Indus Creed is a rock group based in Mumbai, India. It was founded in 1984 as Rock Machine and renamed in 1993, and included.It disbanded in 1997, only to regroup in 2010 with some new members.In its 2014 listing of "25 Greatest Indian Rock Songs of the last 25 Years", "Rolling Stone India".  7.Motherjane- is an Indian rock band from Kochi, India, formed in 1996.One of the prominent name in the rock culture of India.  8.Sky Rabbit-Sky Rabbit (formerly known as Medusa) defines their sound as electronic/alternative.A formidable quartet of Mumbai’s youth, Raxit(Vocals/Samples), Rahul (Guitar/Samples), Siddharth (Bass) and Harsh (Drums) have stumbled upon something unique, merging electronica with indie and post-punk styles.  9.The Vinyl Record aka. TVR is an Indie / Post-Rock band from North-East India (now based in Delhi), formed in February 2010 by Banu, Minam and Mithy who all hail from Arunachal Pradesh. The final touch of the band came when they were joined by the present vocalist and keytarist, Cheyyrian from Assam in January 2011.  10.Bhayanak Maut-Bhayanak Maut ('Terrible Death' in Hindi) is Metal band from Mumbai, formed in November 2003. Bhayanak Maut created a signature metal sound for itself and they thrives on playing live. Their epic stage act is already the stuff of legends. And the fun bit is that they take it a notch higher every time they get on stage. While the audience stays on their toes, witnessing a new Bhayanak Maut at every show.  These are my top 10 hope you will like it!!! Rock N Roll!!!
